Question: This person became increasingly distant from his father, in part because of his father's lack of education.
Hints: This person denounced the decision, alleging it was the product of a conspiracy of Democrats to support the Slave Power.
Although the economy was booming in the region, the business struggled and this person eventually sold his share.
This person appeared before the Illinois Supreme Court in 175 cases, in 51 as sole counsel, of which 31 were decided in his favor.
